org.ambraproject.rhino.identity

Class DoiBasedIdentity

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ambraproject.rhino.identity.DoiBasedIdentity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArticleIdentity, AssetFileIdentity, AssetIdentity

    public class DoiBasedIdentity
extends Object
    An entity identifier based on a Digital Object Identifier (DOI). Instances of this class cover two cases:
    1. The entity is an article, in which case the identifier is the article's actual DOI that would be known to public DOI resolvers.
    2. The entity is not an article, but has a "DOI-like" identifier. In this case, the identifier is not a true DOI that a resolver would recognize. (However, such asset IDs use the parent article's DOI as a prefix, so in that sense they are "DOI-based".)

      • asIdentifier

        public static String asIdentifier(String doi)
        Remove the leading "info:doi/" from a DOI. If the DOI does not start with "info:doi/", return it unchanged.
        Parameters:
        doi - a non-null DOI
        Returns:
        a DOI that does not start with "info:doi/"

        Returns:

      • asKey

        public static String asKey(String doi)
        Return the DOI formatted as a database key value. Under Ambra's current data model, it is prefixed with "info:doi/".
        Parameters:
        doi - a DOI or DOI-like identifier
        Returns:
        the key value

        dois -
        Returns:

      • getIdentifier

        public String getIdentifier()
        Return the DOI or DOI-like identifier for the article or asset that this object identifies. The return value will not be prefixed with "info:doi/" and, under Ambra's current data model, must not be stored in a DOI column of any database table.

        The value this.getIdentifier() represents an actual DOI (that a public DOI resolver would know about) if and only if this.isAsset() returns false.

        Returns:
        the DOI or DOI-like identifier

      • getKey

        public String getKey()
        Return a database key value to represent the article or asset that this object identifies. Under Ambra's current data model, this is the string returned by getIdentifier() prefixed with "info:doi/".
        Returns:
        the key value
